name: Dirt & Decay
description:
This in browser version can be rather laggy, it might be worth trying the download instead

instructions:
WASD or arrow keys to move
right click for water gun
left click for shovel swing
plant plants with water, kill bugs with shovel

Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com

Sound Effects From Open Game Art & Kenney
https://opengameart.org/ & https://kenney.nl/
